column1: Oh honey what you need is a more absorbent tampon.
Well, what's the most absorbent thing in the world?

Because now there is all new, natural 
Cherokee hair tampons. 
.
And when you're done using them  they make a great toy for Jessie.  Go get it boy!
A lot of people carry the ginger gene and don't know.  If your spouse is also a carrier, then your children can turn out like... them.
Oh yes, each one of them's a blessing.
